Meanings: One of Archie's classifications for different types of Carbonate rocks for visible porosity under 10x microscope, some visible porosity with the size smaller than 100 μ
یکی از مقیاس‌های طبقه بندی آرچی که مشخص کننده سنگی است که تحت بزرگنمایی 10 میکروسکپ هیچگونه تخلخلی با اندازه کمتر از صد میکرون در آن مشاهده نمی‌گردد
باز نمودن لوله‌های حفاری از یکدیگر
A portable servicing or workover rig that is self
propelled, using the hoisting engines for motive power. Because the driver's cab is mounted on the end opposite the mast support, the unit must be backed up to the wellhead
Pressure resulting from restriction of full natural flow of Oil or Gas
To hold one section of an object such as pipe while another section is being screwed into or out of it
A portable servicing or workover rig that is self
propelled, using the hoisting engines for motive power. Because the driver's cab is mounted on the end opposite the mast support, the unit must be backed up to the wellhead
باز نمودن لوله‌های حفاری از یکدیگر
فشار معکوس یا فشارباقیمانده در سیستم یا ابزاری که سیال در آن جریان داشته است
The Pressure maintained on equipment or systems through which a fluid flows
. in reference to engines, a term used to describe the resistance to the flow of exhaust gas through the exhaust Pipe
. the operating Pressure level measured downstream from a measuring device
The pressure maintained on equipment or systems through which a fluid flows
A valve used to regulate back
pressure on equipment or systems through which a fluid flows
The area above a packer between casing ID and tubing OD
The person who holds one length of pipe while another length is being screwed into or out of it
گردآورندە این مجموعە فرهنگ اختصارات و لغات حفاری و زمین شناسی
که در حال حاضر در ایران زندگی کرده و ایرانی الاصل می‌باشم: سیامک بهرامی جونقانی

سیامک بهرامی: در حال حاضر در ایران زندگی کرده و ایرانی الاصل می‌باشم و دارای مدرک کارشناسی ارشد از دانشگاه اصفهان در رشته چینه شناسی و فسیل شناسی بوده و در حال حاضر در یکی از شرکتهای نفتی خصوصی در ایران با سمت سنیور ول سایت ژیولوژیست مشغول بکار می‌باشم
بوجود آورنده این گلوسری به دو زبان انگلیسی و فارسی
متولد سال 1344 در اصفهان دارای تحصیلات فوق لیسانس در رشته چینه شناسی و فسیل شناسی از دانشگاه اصفهان. وی در حال حاضر در شرکت‌های نفتی سمت سنیور ول سایت ژیولوژیست را دارا می‌باشد. جهت تماس با اینجانب
با ایمیلی که در این گلوسری ارایه شده تماس بگیرید
که هرزگرد را نگاه می‌دارد و آنرا به قلاب متصل می‌نماید

A curved steel rod on top of the Swivel that resembles the handle, or bail, of an ordinary bucket, but is much larger. Just as an ordinary bucket is hung from a Hook by its bail, the Swivel is hung from the Traveling Block's Hook by its bail. Sometimes, the two steel rods, the links that attach the elevator to the hook are also called bails
. to recover bottomhole fluids, samples, Mud, Sand, or Drill Cuttings by lowering a cylindrical vessel called a bailer to the bottom of a well, filling it, and retrieving it

جهت بیرون کشیدن مواد حفرشده ازکف چاه ازگل کش استفاده می‌گردد. درانتهای گل کش یک دریچه وجود دارد که در موقع برخورد با انتهای چاه باز شده و گل موجود در داخل چاه به داخل آن رفته و هنگامی که گل کش را بالا می‌آورند
وزن گل موجود درآن باعث بسته شدن دریچه شده و بنابراین از خارج شدن آن جلوگیری می‌شود
The main parts of the valves in a plunger
To collect a mass of sticky consolidated material, usually drill cuttings, on drill pipe, drill collars, bits, and so forth. A bit with such material attached to it is called a balled
up bit. Balling up is frequently the result of inadequate pump pressure or insufficient drilling fluid
Barium Sulfate; a mineral frequently used to increase the weight or density of drilling Mud. Its relative density is 4.2 or 4.2 times denser than water
A settled volume of barite particles from a barite slurry placed in the wellbore, usually to seal off a pressured zone
A mixture of barium sulfate, chemicals, and water of a unit density between 18 and 22 pounds per gallon
A measure of volume for petroleum products in the United States. One barrel is the equivalent of 42 U.S. gallons or 0.15899 cubic meters 9,702 cubic inches . One cubic meter equals 6.2897 barrels
تعداد بشکه تحت فشار مایع شده در روز
تعداد بشکه تحت فشار مایع شده در ساعت
نعداد بشکه مربوط به هر چاه در هر روز
A device employed to catch debris from drillable tools, perforators, and so on
An expandable, cylindrically shaped gripping mechanism that is fitted into an overshot to retrieve fish from the borehole
A fishing accessory run above a bit or a mill to recover small, nondrillable pieces of metal or junk
BOREHOLE AUDIO TRACER SURVEY, Log Curve name
تعداد بشکه تحت فشار مایع شده در روز
تعداد بشکه تحت فشار مایع شده در ساعت
A Choke, used to regulate flow of fluid from a well. Different sizes of beans are used for different producing rates

A short length of pipe a Nipple installed on top of the blowout preventer. The top end of the nipple is flared, or belled, to guide drill tools into the hole and usually has side connections for the fill line and mud return line
A short cylindrical device installed in the drill stem between the bottom
most drill collar and a downhole motor. Its purpose is to deflect the downhole motor off vertical to drill a directional hole
A sub used on top of a Downhole Motor to give a "non
straight" bottom assembly. One of the connecting threads is machined at an angle to the axis of the body of the Sub
A colloidal Clay, composed primarily of Montmorillonite, that swells when wet. Because of its gel forming properties, bentonite is a major component of water
buff , light yellow color, a yellow
نوعی سبد یا بسکت که درعملیات حفاری بکار برده می‌شود
مجموعه مته و ملحقات بالای آن که در مجموع در عملیات حفاری مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرند
شامل: انواع ساب‌ها و استبیلایزر و غیره
BHA, lost time due to BHA failure, Actions or jobs which Companymans write in their reports
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
lost time due to BHA failure, actions or job's abbreviation which Companymans write in reports
زمان از دست رفته یا تلف شده بعلت خرابی در مجموعه بی. اچ. ای

Lost time due to BHA failure , DHM, Jar stabilizer, basically any BHA component other than surveying or Logging Tools, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
Lost time due to Bit/BHA Balling, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
BOREHOLE COMPENSATED ACOUSTILOG, Log Curve name
BOREHOLE COMPENSATED SONIC, Log Curve name
فشار ته چاه در حال جریان
Lost time due to well bore instability, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports

The cutting or boring element used in drilling Oil and Gas Wells. This Bit consists of a cutting element and a circulating element. The circulating element permits the passage of drilling fluid and utilized the hydraulic force of the fluid stream to improve drilling rates. In rotary drilling, several drill collars are joined to the bottom end of the drill pipe column, and the Bit is attached to the end of the string of Drill Collars. Most Bits used in rotary drilling are Roller Cone Bits, but Diamond Bits are also used extensively
black, also write blk or bl
توصیف کاتینگ‌های حفاری در مورد سنگی که حالت متراکم و گوشه‌های زاویه دار دارد
black, also write as : bk or blk
bk, also write as : blk or bl
To drain off liquid or gas, generally slowly, through a valve called a bleeder. To bleed down, or bleed off, means to release pressure slowly from a well or from pressurized equipment
Reduce pressure by letting oil or gas escape at a low rate
An integral part of a Blow
Out Preventer, which serves as the closing element on an open hole. Its ends do not fit around the drill pipe but seal against each other and shut off the space below completely
دو لبه دو قطعه آن صاف و تخت بوده و پس از چسبیدن به یکدیگر فضای زیر خود را مسدود می‌کند
black, also write as : bk or bl
سنگ یا کاتینگی که حالت زاویه دار در گوشه‌ها داشته و سخت باشد
توصیف کاتینگ‌های حفاری در مورد سنگی که حالت متراکم و گوشه‌های زاویه دار دارد
بی. ا. پی. یا جلوگیری کننده از فوران که در زیر سکوی حفاری نصب شده و دارای سایز‌ها یا اندازه‌های مختلف بر حسب اینچ می‌باشد

An uncontrolled flow of gas, oil, or other well fluids into the atmosphere or into an underground formation. A blowout, or gusher, can occur when formation pressure exceeds the pressure applied to it by the column of drilling fluid

One of several valves installed at the wellhead to prevent the escape of pressure either in the annular space between the casing and drill pipe or in open hole i.e., hole with no drill pipe during drilling completion operations. Blowout preventers on land rigs are located beneath the rig at the land's surface; on jackup or platform rigs, at the water's surface; and on floating offshore rigs, on the seafloor
Controls, usually located near the driller's position on the rig floor, that are manipulated to open and close the blowout preventers

A training procedure to determine that rig crews are completely familiar with correct operating practices to be followed in the use of blowout prevention equipment. A "dry run" of blowout preventative action
The closing and sealing components of a preventer, like the gate in a gate valve
control equipment including preventers, spools, valves, and nipples connected to the top of the wellhead
Bailer, a long cylindrical container, fitted with a valve at its lower end, used to remove Water, Sand, Mud, or Oil from a well
walled container, usually steel, used to hold devices that determine and record pressure or temperature in a wellbore
A device set in tubing, particular collars, to facilities the landing of pressure bombs, recorders
The part of a valve that packs off and encloses the valve stem

A device made up in the drill stem above the mill to collect bits of junk ground away during a milling operation. During milling, drilling mud under high pressure forces bits of junk up the narrow space between the boot sub and the hole wall. When the junk reaches the wider annulus above the boot sub and pressure drops slightly, the junk falls into the boot sub. A boot sub also can be run above the bit during routine drilling to collect small pieces of junk that may damage the bit or interfere with its operation
بخش زیرین سکوی حفاری: که از فوران چاه جلوگیری می‌نماید
به آن فورانگیر نیز می‌گویند و دارای اندازه‌های مختلف بر حسب اینچ است
Lost time due to problems within BOP/well head operation, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
Out Preventers installed on a Well

All operation necessary for the preparation, dissemble, recovery and handling of well head and BOP and relevant test, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
A hole made by drilling or boring, a Wellbore
Total pressure exerted in the wellbore by a column of fluid and/or back

An area of reduced diameter in pipe caused by excessive longitudinal strain or by a combination of longitudinal string and the swagging action of a body. A bottleneck may result if the downward motion of the drill pipe is stopped with the slips instead of the brake

A mobile submersible drilling structure constructed of several steel cylinders, or bottles. When the bottles are flooded, the rig submerges and rests on bottom; when water is removed from the bottles, the rig floats. The latest designs of this type of rig drill in water depths up to 100 feet, or 30.5 meters
مجموعه مته و ملحقات بالای آن که در مجموع در عملیات حفاری مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرند
شامل: انواع ساب‌ها و استبیلایزر و غیره
Water occurring in a producing Formation below the Oil or Gas in that same Formation
Water found below oil and gas in a producing Formation
A device with a restricted opening placed in the lower end of the tubing to control the rate of flow
fight container bomb used to record the pressure in a well at a point opposite the producing formation
فشار ته چاه که باعث جریان میشود
A device to measure bottomhole pressure

A test that measures the reservoir pressure of the well, obtained at a specific depth or at the midpoint of the producing zone. A flowing bottomhole pressure test measures pressure while the well continues to flow; a shut
in bottomhole pressure test measures pressure after the well has been shut in for a specified period of time. See also : bottomhole pressure, bottomhole pressure gauge
A complete Trip from the bottom of the Wellbore to the top

A type of mobile offshore drilling unit that has a part of its structure in contact with the seafloor when it is on site and drilling a well. The remainder of the rig is supported above the water. The rig can float, however, allowing it to be moved from one drill site to another. Bottom
supported units include submersible rigs and jackup rigs
One of Carbonate rocks with fossil, e.g. Reef, Stromatolite components and well packed Sparite , high energy conditions, Dunham Classification of Carbonate Rocks
With Fossil components such as : Reef, Stromatolite and well packed, Sparite , high energy conditions
یک نوع سنگ در طبقه بندی سنگهای کربناته که سازنده‌های عمده آن ریف
استروماتولیت یا کلا فسیل‌های از این دست هستند
سنگی که کلا از فسیلهایی مانند ریف یا استروماتولیت تشکیل شده است و در هنگام رسوبگذاری به یکدیگر متصل شده اند
The female section of a connection. See also : Tool Joint
تعداد بشکه مربوط به هر چاه در هر روز
Water that contains relatively low concentrations of soluble salts. Brackish water is saltier than fresh water but not as salty as salt water
باز کردن لوله‌های حفاری از یکدیگر
باز نمودن لوله‌های حفاری از یکدیگر
کت هد راست یا باز کننده

To start the mud pump for restoring circulation of the mud column. Because the stagnant drilling fluid has thickened or gelled during the period of no circulation, high pump pressure is usually required to break circulation
To loosen a tight joint as in line pipe or sucker rods
Unscrewing the Drill Stem into single joints and placing them on the pipe rack. The operation takes place on completion of the well, or in changing from one size of pipe to another
A device attached to the catshaft of the drawworks that is used as a power source for unscrewing drill pipe; usually located opposite the driller's side of the Drawworks. See also : Cathead
سنگی مانند کنگلومرا که دارای قطعاتی از سنگهای دیگر است ولی دارای زاویه
A phenomenon that sometimes occurs when a well blows out. Rocks, sand, clay, and other debris clog the hole and stop the blowout
A downhole tool, composed primarily of slips, a plug mandrel, and a rubber sealing element, that is run and set in casing to isolate a lower zone while an upper section is being tested or cemented
ابزاری که در هنگام تزریق پلاگ سیمانی درون چاه کار گذاشته می‌شود
To complete a well and put it on producing status
یکی دیگر از شیوه‌های نوشتن اختصار برای رنگ قهوه ای
یکی دیگر از شیوه‌های نوشتن اختصار برای لغت شکننده
BOREHOLE COMPENSATED SONIC, Log Curve name
A tubular device that, when lowered to a selected depth within a well, fires bullets through the casing to provide holes through which the formation fluids may enter the wellbore
Forcing Gas back into a Formation by pumping into the Annulus from the surface
. any pumping procedure in which fluid is pumped into the Well against pressure

A device made up in the drill string that, when actuated, delivers a heavy downward blow to the string. A bumper jar has a hollow body that moves upward when the drill string is picked up. When the string is dropped quickly, the jar body produces a sharp downward blow on the tubing or pipe made up below the jar. If downward blows can free a fish, a bumper jar can be very effective

A Slip joint that is part of the String of Drill Pipe used in drilling from a Drillship to absorb the vertical motion of the ship caused by wave action. The Slip joint is inserted above the heavy Drill Collars in order to maintain the weight of the Collars on the Drill Bit as the Drill Pipe above the Slip joint up and down with the motion of the ship
A percussion tool run on a fishing string to jar downward or upward on a stuck fish to knock it free. The bumper sub body moves up and down on a mandrel

A Milling device attached to the bottom of Washpipe that Mills or drills debris accumulated around the outside of the pipe being washed over. usually, a burn shoe has pieces of very hard tungsten carbide embedded in it. Also called a Rotary Shoe. See also : Washpipe
A pipe fitting on which the external thread is larger than the internal thread to allow two pipes of different sizes to be connected
A paraffin hydrocarbon, a gas in atmospheric conditions but is easily liquefied under pressure. It is a constituent of liquefied petroleum gas
